reddit.title: Did Zora just backstab Base?
reddit.why_relevant: Meta discussion about the Zora/Base relationship; includes opinions about creator/content coins.

web.title: Zora Launches Attention Markets on Solana
web.snippet: Jesse Pollak, the creator of Ethereum Layer 2 Base, which is closely integrated with Zora, took to X to share the launch, where he said, “Excited to see zora continue to experiment to grow the onchain pie.

web.title: Zora Launches Attention Markets on Solana - "The Defiant"
web.snippet: Jesse Pollak, the creator of Ethereum Layer 2 Base, which is closely integrated with Zora, took to X to share the launch, where he said, “Excited to see zora continue to experiment to grow the onchain pie.

web.title: Zora launches 'attention markets' on Solana | The Block
web.snippet: Zora is known for experiments bridging crypto and the creator economy, including an early NFT marketplace and more recently Base-based “creator coins”, which allowed traders to speculate on individual social media posts and creator profiles.

web.title: Zora moves onto Solana with “attention markets” for trading internet trends
web.snippet: Zora was among the breakout applications on Coinbase's Layer 2 Base network in the past few years. It launched its ZORA token there in April, and helped roll out Creator Coins tied to Base profiles in July, a push that briefly helped Base overtake ...

web.title: Zora moves onto Solana with “attention markets” for trading internet trends
web.snippet: It launched its ZORA token there in April, and helped roll out Creator Coins tied to Base profiles in July, a push that briefly helped Base overtake Solana in daily token creation.

web.title: Base App Ends Creator Rewards to Concentrate on Trading Assets | WEEX Crypto News
web.snippet: This transition does not spell the end for Creator Coins, a separate initiative that enables users to craft ERC-20 tokens linked to their profiles and participate on platforms like Zora.

web.title: Base App Ends Farcaster Talk Feed As It Refocuses On Trading
web.snippet: The shutdown does not impact Creator Coins. Users can generate ERC-20 tokens associated with their Base App profiles. The option is integrated with the decentralized media platform Zora.

web.title: Vitalik Proposes Curated DAO Model for Creator Coins
web.snippet: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has pitched a new way to structure creator coins. The focus is not on more content but on better content. Buterin said crypto has spent almost ten years trying to pay creators through tokens. Platforms such as Bihu and Steemit came first. BitClout surged in 2021. Zora followed later.
